message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's in excellent condition and worth a lot to the right person. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Bob, I appreciate your interest but $11,500 is significantly below what I'm willing to accept.  How about we split the difference and I offer it to you for $13,250?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that. What do you think?
